MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML11 postcode area of Lanark, affecting properties in Bannatyne Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.07pm. Our engineers have arrived at Ladyacre Road and are investigating reports of third party damage to an electricity cable. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.34pm on Tuesday 16th March 2021
